author: CBC News
description: The Sackville emergency room will be closed all weekend and the Sussex emergency room will be closed during the evenings, starting Friday, because of a physician and nurse shortage caused by an increase in COVID-19 cases, the Horizon Health Network says.
title: COVID-19 cases among doctors and nurses forces weekend closures of Sackville and Sussex ERs

author: CBC News
description: Snowbirds Capt. Richard MacDougall has spent the last two years recovering from a devastating crash that took the life of his passenger, Capt. Jenn Casey, during demonstration flight in Kamloops, B.C.
title: Q&A: Snowbirds pilot reflects on 2 years since Kamloops crash
content:
For Capt. Richard MacDougall, one goal is always firmly in his sights.
He intends to climb back into the pilot's seat of a CF-114 Tutor aircraft again and soar with the Canadian Forces Snowbirds.

description: A former premier and a former MP will lead the redrawing of boundaries for New Brunswick’s 49 provincial election ridings.
